sentences.sContent: Guess how long is the longest fingernail in the world?
sentences.sContent_eng: Guess how long is the longest fingernail in the world?
sentences.sCn: 请大家猜猜看世界上最长的手指甲到底有多长呢。

sentences.sContent: Humans encounter a lot of trouble when they are the size of a fingernail.
sentences.sContent_eng: Humans encounter a lot of trouble when they are the size of a fingernail.
sentences.sCn: 当人类和手指甲一样大时，会遇到的麻烦可不少。

sentences.sContent: The Sydney funnel web is able to drive its fangs through a fingernail - and isn't the least bit afraid of humans.
sentences.sContent_eng: The Sydney funnel web is able to drive its fangs through a fingernail - and isn't the least bit afraid of humans.
sentences.sCn: 悉尼漏斗网蜘蛛可以把毒牙刺入人的指甲，关键是它们一点都不怕人。

words.tran: 指法；用指摸弄；手指弹奏；指法符号；细绒线
用手指触摸；指出；谴责；用指弹奏（finger的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: the hard flat part that covers the top end of your finger
